name: Fun sized sarvente KADE ENGINE port
name_original: Fun sized sarvente KADE ENGINE port
description:
quick description: Fun-Sized Sarvente is a MOD for Friday Night Funkin’ that replaces BF with a cute little version of Sarvente in weeks 1, 2, 3 and 4 of the game. Downloading this MOD will not give you access to new songs or in-game remixes, as it only changes the appearance of the game’s protagonist’s skin. btw, i FINALLY FOUND OUT HOW TO FIX THE "Too big" PROBLEM, i had to resize the image to the size the boyfriend was supposed to have. wOoOoOo-

CREDITS: phykro for foned in, CheriiDreams for the mod, and ninjamuffin for fnf itself

THIS MOD IS NOT MINE, SO THE MAKER HAS FULL PERMISSION TO TAKE THIS DOWN!
